channel.title: Pages on Hooked on Data
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Hooked on Data

item.title: About
item.description: I work at DataCamp as a Data Scientist on the growth team. Previously, I was a Data Analyst at Etsy working with their search team to design, implement, and analyze experiments on the ranking algorithm, UI changes, and new features. I regularly give talks on A/B testing and R programming at conferences and meetups; if you’re interested in having me speak at your event, please email at emily[at]datacamp.com. You can see a list of all my past talks, including links to recordings where available, here.

item.title: Speaking
item.description: I regularly give talks on A/B Testing, working in R, joining the Data Science community, and more. If you’re interested in having me speak at your event, please contact me at emily[at]datacamp.com Upcoming Talks July 2019, Demystifying Data Science, an online conference by Metis. June 2019, Data Matters in London. June 2019, Keynote at Microsoft internal One Analyst conference in Seattle. Previous Talks Everything You Wanted to Know About Making R Packages but Were Afraid to Ask May 2019, New York R Conference.
